name: Ida&Robot
description:
Ida & Robot is an Pixel Art 2.5D Platformer.
Synopsis:

The earth has developed into a large nursing home for old people and their robots.
On the planet lives Ida, a elder lady with a fable for mechanics. She escapes the enclave to search for her goal behind the boring walls of her everyday life.
On her journey she meets the robot D_Vice who is traveling together with an artificial Intelligence called M.A.R.T.I.

What nobody knows is that M.A.R.T.I is slowly starting to lose control over his system...

This game is still in development. Feel free to shoot any questions or feedback at us!

Features:

- WallJump

- moving Platforms

- SwitchPuzzles

- 2 playable characters
